I'm a 2nd-year PhD Student in Cognitive Neuroscience at LPNC, CNRS UMR 5105, UGA, Grenoble, France. My [research project](https://lpnc.univ-grenoble-alpes.fr/recherche/production-scientifique/projets-en-cours/lumintermod) is about modeling the neurocognitive mechanisms that uphold language production across the lifespan. Find out more about our team LPNC-LANG [here](https://lpnc.univ-grenoble-alpes.fr/recherche/equipes-recherche/equipe-langage).
:::
